name: Bio Crisis
description:
Bio Crisis, what can I say, one hell of a cover based shooter that excites and challenges all players
-Touch Arcade

Bio Crisis is highly recommended for fans of the genre, especially if you’re sick of the mindless shooters found throughout the AppStore.
-Theappshack

Fans of old school games will absolutely love it.
-Touchgen

A game that gives a sense of nostalgia while also feeling fresh.
-appolicious

Bio Crisis is a highly polished pixel shooter, worthy of your device, it’s tough going but extremely fun
-Appzilla

There is no school like the old school! And Bio Crisis is old school at its finest.

The game which had won multi Indie Game Design Awards now is refined, polished, upgraded and bringing more fire power than its original version to the Appstore!

Game is well build even for today’s mobile standard, dodging bullets, hide behind an object, stealth knife kill in close combat, roll through the bullet rains unharmed are just a few of what this game can bring to the table.

With a storyline set in the future, it will sure keep the players feel like being a part in this exciting action packed adventure. With loads of different weapons, upgrades and powerup items to choose, ammunition is one thing that’s not short of in this game.

36 Total Missions
Medal System
Supports both iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad
3 More Challenging Stages
Tons of Weapons and Gears
Upgradeable Weapons

★★★★★
